scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.postversion: git push -u origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) --follow-tags && npm publish && echo '…released.'
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'build: release major version %s'
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'build: release minor version %s'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'build: release patch version %s'
